title: Key Witness Has Covid, Disrupting Trump Organization Trial
description: Jeffrey S. McConney, the company’s controller, had coughing fits on the stand. The judge said the trial would likely resume Monday, but that many in the courtroom were at risk.
dc:creator: Lola Fadulu, Nate Schweber and Jonah E. Bromwich
media:description: Jeffrey McConney, controller of the Trump Organization, was the first witness in the company’s criminal trial.
